comment.body:
### Issue URL (Incorrect Blocking) [https://t.co](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Ft.co) ### Comment Username: @Sergeant-Pancakes > AdGuard DNS protection appears to be misidentifying the t.co site as a malware site or otherwise sees it as unsafe. AdGuard safari protection works normally with t.co though. I started to notice the issue today, so it may have started happening either today or a day or two ago. ### Screenshots
Screenshot 1 ![Screenshot 1](https://cdn.adguard.info/sitereports/guokyverjjwckkkkoo8cccooo8wwcgol4waa15e7nk.jpg?nc=1)
Screenshot 2 ![Screenshot 2](https://cdn.adguard.info/sitereports/rrn99fnhzn4osw080wk88sksc4kcgs82i00yvcugii.png?nc=1)

filters: `https://t.co t.co t.com` Filters: | Ad Blocking:
